silver.name: Brawler Heart

silver.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 20% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

silver.name: First Aid Kit

silver.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

champion.name: Stubborn
champion.desc: Gain an Alistar. Combat start: He 50% Shreds (MR reduction) all enemy units.

champion.name: Behemoth
champion.desc: Gain an Alistar. He gains 350 maximum health. His ability hits all adjacent enemies, and deals bonus damage to his primary target equal to 25% of his maximum health.

champion.name: Pyromania
champion.desc: Gain an Annie. Her spell is larger, and the every cast, stuns all target hits for 2 seconds.

champion.name: Burning Spirit
champion.desc: Gain an Annie. When you field her, your team gains 15 Ability Power, tripled while they are below 50% Health.

champion.name: Laser Focus
champion.desc: Gain an Ashe. She gains 45% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

champion.name: Corps Focus
champion.desc: Gain an Ashe. When you field her, your team gains 20% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

champion.name: Extinction Event
champion.desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. He has 15 Ability Power and his Ability's meteors are larger.

champion.name: Velocity Impact
champion.desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. His Ability stuns enemies hit for 1.75 seconds.

champion.name: Back for Blood
champion.desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. She has 25% Omnivamp, tripled while under 50% Health.

champion.name: Voidmother
champion.desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. Combat Start: Your strongest Bel'Veth creates 2 Voidspawns with 88% of their normal Health in front of her.

champion.name: Dynamic Defenses
champion.desc: Gain a Blitzcrank and a Gargoyle Stoneplate. When he casts his Ability, its duration increases by 2 second per enemy targeting him.

champion.name: Rocket Grab
champion.desc: Gain a Blitzcrank. He has 1.5 bonus Health. Combat start: He pulls the farthest enemy and stuns them for 400 seconds.

champion.name: Adaptive Defensives
champion.desc: Gain a Camille. She has 20% Attack Damage. The first time she drops below 50% Health, she gains a shield equal to 500% of her Attack Damage.

champion.name: Hextech Retribution
champion.desc: Gain a Camille. When you field her, your team deals 8% bonus damage, increasing by an additional 5% whenever an ally dies.

champion.name: League of Draven
champion.desc: Gain a Draven. He gains 25% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 35% chance to gain 1 gold.

champion.name: Ruthless Blades
champion.desc: Gain a Draven. When you field him, your team gains 55% Critical Strike Chance.

champion.name: Destructive Resonance
champion.desc: Gain an Ekko. Ekko’s spell hits all enemies within 3 hexes, and deals 240% bonus damage, but no longer slows enemies’ Attack Speed.

champion.name: Chronobreak
champion.desc: Gain an Ekko. When you field him, he stuns all enemies for 2.5 seconds after 8 seconds of combat.

champion.name: Rising Spell Force
champion.desc: Gain an Ezreal. When he casts his Ability, he gains 16%% Attack Speed and 16 Ability Power for the rest of combat (this can stack).

champion.name: Raider's Spoils
champion.desc: Gain an Ezreal. Combat Start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat.

champion.name: Scarier-crow
champion.desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Fiddlesticks continues absorbing Corrupted Souls even while no longer dormant. If he is still dormant after 8 seconds, he immediately casts. Fiddlesticks’ spell can critically strike.

champion.name: Absolute Corruption
champion.desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Combat Start: Fiddlesticks grants its nearest ally 30 Ability Power and allows them to share its Corrupted souls.

champion.name: Grand Challenge
champion.desc: Gain a Fiora. Every 4 attacks on the all unit. she deals 20% of her maximum health as magic damage, and heals for 12% of her maximum health.

champion.name: Vitality of the Ox
champion.desc: Gain a Fiora. When you field her, your team heals 25% of their maximum Health when they 10 attack.

champion.name: Flaming Ricochet
champion.desc: Gain a Gangplank. His Ability bounces to a second target dealing 80% damage.

champion.name: Get Paid
champion.desc: Gain a Gangplank. When you field him, your team has a 50% chance to gain 1 gold on kill.

champion.name: Category Five
champion.desc: Gain a Janna. She gains 10 Ability Power and her ability does True Damage.

champion.name: Exaggerated Reporting
champion.desc: Gain a Janna. Forecaster's effects are increased by 200%.

champion.name: Relentless Assault
champion.desc: Gain a Jax. After every 3rd attack, he gains 18% Attack Speed for the rest of combat (this can stack).

champion.name: Grandmaster’s Training
champion.desc: Gain a Jax. When you field him, your team gains 20 Armor and 12% Attack Speed. These bonuses are doubled when your strongest Jax dies.

champion.name: Get Excited!
champion.desc: Gain a Jinx. She gains 30% Attack Speed and Move speed. When she scores a takedown this amount is tripled for 6 seconds.

champion.name: Everyone Goes BOOM!
champion.desc: Gain a Jinx. When you field her, your team gains 9% Attack Speed, tripled after the first enemy dies each combat.

champion.name: Reconnaissance team
champion.desc: Gain a Kai’Sa. At the start of combat, Kai’Sa and her two closest allied champions gain 40% Critical Strike Chance and their spells can crit.

champion.name: Multi-Shot
champion.desc: Gain a Kai'Sa. Gain 10 AP, Every 2 projectiles, she fires a bonus attack at a nearby enemy.

champion.name: Divine Ascent
champion.desc:
Gain a Kayle. She gains bonuses per star level.
1: 40% Attack Speed
2: +2 Attack Range
3: Attacks fire 2 additional bolts dealing 50% damage.

champion.name: Righteous Range
champion.desc: Gain a Kayle. Combat Start: She and her 2 nearest allies gain +2 Attack Range and 33% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Aim Assist
champion.desc: Gain a LeBlanc. For every 3 sigils fired by her Ability, she fires an extra sigil at the lowest Health enemy.

champion.name: Mirror Image
champion.desc: Gain a LeBlanc. Combat start: Your strongest LeBlanc duplicates her nearest ally (without items at 99% Health).

champion.name: Cleansing Safeguard
champion.desc: Gain a Lee Sin. His Ability costs 15 less Mana to cast. When he casts, he sheds all negative effects and heals 15% of his missing Health.

champion.name: Invigorate
champion.desc: Gain a Lee Sin. When your field him, your team gains 20% Attack Speed, doubled for 4 seconds after being shielded.

champion.name: Perfected Solar Flare
champion.desc: Gain a Leona. She has 30 Ability Power and her Abilities cost 40 less Mana to cast.

champion.name: Eclipse Prime
champion.desc: Gain a Leona. When you field her, your team takes 20 less damage.

champion.name: Growth Spurt
champion.desc: Gain a Lulu. When she casts her Ability, she gains 100 bonus Health and 18 Ability Power (this can stack).

champion.name: Foster Growth
champion.desc: Gain a Lulu. When you field her, she and allies holding an item gain 35 Ability Power.

champion.name: Illuminating Singularity
champion.desc: Gain a Lux. Every 2nd cast, her Ability deals 150% increased damage.

champion.name: Lucent Barrier
champion.desc: Gain a Lux. Combat Start: She grants her 2 nearest allies a 500 Health Shield and 35 Ability Power.

champion.name: Rock Solid
champion.desc: Gain a Malphite. He has Ability Power equal to 130% of his Armor and his Ability's Armor duration is increased by 4 seconds.

champion.name: Guardian Spirit
champion.desc: Gain a Malphite. When you field him, your team restores 20% of their missing Health when they cast Abilities.

champion.name: Bunny Mercenary
champion.desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. Her Ability covers a wider cone and she gains a 200 Health shield while channeling.

champion.name: Make It Rain
champion.desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. After every 3 player combats fielded, she drops 10-25 gold (based on current Stage).

champion.name: Not So Heavy Metal
champion.desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. He gains 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

champion.name: Obliterate
champion.desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. Combat start: He Shreds and Sunders enemies by 20%.

champion.name: Stacks on Stacks
champion.desc: Gain a Nasus. He gains 20% Attack Damage, increased by 3% permanently each time he casts his Ability.

champion.name: Soul Eater
champion.desc: Gain a Nasus. When you field him, he and his allies heal 275 Health on takedowns.

champion.name: Gifted
champion.desc: Gain a Nilah. She gains 40 Ability Power. Combat Start: Your strongest Nilah grants her nearest ally a temporary copy of one of her normal items.

champion.name: Jubilant Veil
champion.desc: Gain a Nilah. Combat start: She and her 4 nearest allies gain immunity to crowd control for 20 seconds.

champion.name: They See Me Rolling
champion.desc: Gain a Nunu. He has 25 Ability Power and 20% movement speed.

champion.name: Contagious Laughter
champion.desc: Gain a Nunu. When you field him, your team gains 10 Ability Power and an additional 10 every 5 seconds.

champion.name: Bigger, Better Buckler
champion.desc: Gain a Poppy. She gains 180 Armor.

champion.name: Steadfast Presence
champion.desc: Gain a Poppy. Combat start: Your strongest Poppy grants your team a 375 Health shield.

champion.name: Armored-dillo
champion.desc: Gain a Rammus. When you field him, your team gains 40 Armor, doubled for himself.

champion.name: Spiked Shell
champion.desc: Gain a Rammus. When struck by an attack, he deals magic damage equal to 150% of his Armor to all nearby enemies (once every 2 seconds).

champion.name: Hold the Line
champion.desc: Gain a Rell. She has 60 Ability Power and 35% damage reduction.

champion.name: Channelled Ferromancy
champion.desc: Gain a Rell. When you field her, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist. and 5 when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

champion.name: Reign of Anger
champion.desc: Gain a Renekton. He gains 40% Attack Speed and an extra 4% per 100 missing Health.

champion.name: Cull the Meek
champion.desc: Gain a Renekton. When you field him, your team deals 8% bonus damage, tripled against enemies below 50% Health.

champion.name: Reverberation
champion.desc: Gain a Riven. She has 15 Ability Power and her Ability is additionally cast on her lowest Health ally.

champion.name: Triumphant Return
champion.desc: Gain a Riven. Combat Start: She grants herself and adjacent allies a shield for 15 seconds equal to 45% of their maximum Health.

champion.name: Style & Flair
champion.desc: Gain a Samira. She gains 30% Attack Damage. When she scores a takedown, she restores 30% of her maximum Mana.

champion.name: Daredevil
champion.desc: Gain a Samira. Your team gains 3.5% Attack Speed for each 10 Tactician Health missing.

champion.name: Time and a Half
champion.desc: Gain a Sivir. After each player combat round, gain 1 gold for every 42 Attack Damage your strongest Sivir has.

champion.name: Mana Tempering
champion.desc: Gain a Sivir. When you field her, your team gains 20% Attack Damage, and 5% when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

champion.name: Power Grid
champion.desc: Gain a Sona. She has 10 Ability Power and her Ability fires 1 additional beam.

champion.name: Undercurrent
champion.desc: Gain a Sona. Combat Start: Your strongest Sona grants her 2 nearest allies 50 Mana.

champion.name: Kingslayer
champion.desc: Gain a Sylas. Gain maximum 25% and increase damage 30%.

champion.name: Petricite Chains
champion.desc: Gain a Sylas. When you field him, your team gains 30 starting Mana and his Ability increases enemies' maximum Mana by 35%.

champion.name: Not In Vain
champion.desc: Gain a Syndra. Your strongest Syndra gains 40 starting Mana, and 75% Attack Speed every time an ally dies.

champion.name: Empowered Reserves
champion.desc: Gain a Syndra. When you field her, your team gains 5 Ability Power per unit and item on your bench.

champion.name: Shiny
champion.desc: Gain an Urgot. His Ability has an extra 25% chance to dredge up treasure.

champion.name: Rising Tide
champion.desc: Gain an Urgot. Combat Start: He grants adjacent allies 30% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Spread Shot
champion.desc: Gain a Vayne. Her Ability also fires at 2 other nearby enemies, dealing 44% damage.

champion.name: Into the Night
champion.desc: Gain an Edge of Night and a Vayne. When you field her, allies equipped with Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Unrelenting Force
champion.desc: Gain a Vi. When she takes or deals damage, she gains 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, stacking up to 25 times.

champion.name: Boxing Lessons
champion.desc: Gain a Vi. When you field her, your team gains 250 bonus Health.

champion.name: Heartstopper
champion.desc: Gain a Viego. He has 10 Ability Power and his Ability deals up to 50% increased damage based on the enemy's missing Health.

champion.name: Partners in Crime
champion.desc: Gain a Viego. When you field him, your team gains 12% Omnivamp, tripled when 2 or less allies remain.

champion.name: Cyclone
champion.desc: Gain a Wukong. He has 18 Ability Power and +1 hex Ability range.

champion.name: Re-Energize
champion.desc: Gain a Wukong. When you field him, your team restores 66% of their Mana after their first cast each combat.

champion.name: Winds of the Wanderer
champion.desc: Gain a Yasuo. His spell is bigger and does 8% increases damage.

champion.name: Spirit of the Exile
champion.desc: Gain a Yasuo. When you field him, allies who start combat with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Deathbringer
champion.desc: Gain an Aatrox. His Abilities deal additional damage equal to 15% of his Maximum Health.

champion.name: Darkin Assimilation
champion.desc: Gain an Aatrox. When you field him, 40% of the damage your team receives is instead dealt over 3 seconds as non-lethal damage.

champion.name: Full Power to Sword
champion.desc: Gain a Garen. His ability costs 50 less Mana to cast and deals additional damage equal to 180% of his Attack Damage, but no longer stuns.

champion.name: My Sword is Your Shield
champion.desc: Gain a Garen. Combat Start and when your strongest Garen casts his ability: Garen shields allies for 12% of their maximum health for 4 seconds.

champion.name: Synchronous Plating
champion.desc: Gain a Gnar. He gains 45 Armor and Magic Resistance, plus another 5 until the end of combat every time he damages an enemy with his Ability.

champion.name: Temper Tantrum
champion.desc: Gain a Gnar. When you field him, enemies take 10% more damage, increased to 20% the first time they are damaged by Gnar's attacks or Ability.

champion.name: Rule of Four
champion.desc: Gain a Jhin. Every 4 takedowns he gets each combat, he drops 2-4 gold(base on current Stage). He also drops 10% an item component.

champion.name: Wrath of the Rift
champion.desc: Gain a Jhin. When you field him, your units that start combat in the back 2 rows deal 16% bonus damage.

champion.name: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
champion.desc: Gain a Lucian. The first time your strongest Lucian casts his Ability each combat, and every 3 times afterwards, gain 2 experience point.

champion.name: Enchanted Ammunition
champion.desc: Gain a Lucian. When you field him, your team gains 30 Ability Power, and 1 When they attack (this can stack).

champion.name: Fear is Freedom
champion.desc: Gain a Morgana. Morgana sends out 1 additional Dark Binding when she casts her Ability, and her Dark Bindings stun their targets for 0.5 additional second.

champion.name: Gas Giant Slayer
champion.desc: Gain a Morgana. When you field her, your team's abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

champion.name: Easy Being Green
champion.desc: Gain a Neeko and a Spear of Shojin. When you field her, allies holding Spear of Shojin gain 35% Ability Power.

champion.name: Starlight Resonance
champion.desc: Gain a Neeko. On combat start and when your strongest Neeko casts her Ability, she grants herself and her closest ally 18 Ability Power until the end of combat.

champion.name: The Best Offense
champion.desc: Gain a Pantheon. He gains 40 Ability Power and 100 Magic Resistance.

champion.name: Chronic Hallucinations
champion.desc: Gain a Pantheon. Combat start: He and his 4 nearest allies take 60% reduced damage for 6 seconds.

champion.name: Your Cut
champion.desc: Gain a Pyke. After player combat rounds, gain 1 guaranteed shop refresh, 1 free Shop refresh(es) for every 2 time(s) your strongest Pyke cast his Ability last round.

champion.name: Small Game Hunter
champion.desc: Gain a Pyke. When you field him, your team's abilities and attacks deal 10% more damage, increased to 25% against enemies with less than 1400 maximum Health.

champion.name: Time Knife
champion.desc: Gain a Shen. His spell costs 10 less Mana, and after casting his spell, his next 3 attack(s) deal bonus true damage equal to 250% of his Armor

champion.name: Recursion Matrix
champion.desc: Gain a Shen. When you field him, your team takes 7% reduced damage, tripled for 4 seconds when they cast Abilities.

champion.name: Ante up
champion.desc: Gain a Twisted Fate. Your strongest Twisted Fate drops 1 gold every 20-10 cards thrown each combat (based on current Stage).

champion.name: Gear Shift
champion.desc: Gain a Twisted Fate. When you field him, your team gains 12% Attack Speed, doubled after they cast their Ability the first time each combat.

champion.name: Temporal Disruption
champion.desc: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. Enemies damaged by Ultimate Ezreal's Ability are 2% Burned and 33% Wounded.

champion.name: Accelerated Mentorship
champion.desc: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. After player combat rounds where you fielded him, gain 8 experience points.

champion.name: Joy Siphon
champion.desc: Gain a Vex. Vex heals the 2 lowest health units on your team for 30% of the damage she deals with abilities and attacks.

champion.name: Endless Darkness
champion.desc: Gain a Vex. When you field her, your team gains 20 Ability Power, and 5 when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

champion.name: Big Data
champion.desc: Gain a Warwick. When you field him, your units deal 0.65% increased damage for every 100 Health they have.

champion.name: Well Fed+
champion.desc: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 150 Maximum Health. This is increased by 1 every 3 times your strongest Warwick attacks.

champion.name: Well Fed
champion.desc: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 60 Maximum Health. This is increased by 1 every 3 times your strongest Warwick attacks.
